testsuite.system-out: User creation Correct execution should correctly save the user User creation Correct execution should return the created user User creation The email already exists should throw an exception and not save the user User deletion Correct execution should correctly delete the specified user User deletion The user doesn't exist should throw an exception and should not delete any user
